    • About Kevin Clancy


    Kevin Clancy is the #1 Realtor in the Capital Region as voted by the Times Union Readers “best of” poll. He has been providing real estate brokerage and appraisal services to the Capital District for over 25 years. He is a New York State licensed real estate broker, Insurance broker, and general certified appraiser. Kevin is a HUD approved broker and started his career specializing in the sale of HUD homes. Kevin’s appraisal experience ranges from vacant land and single family homes to multi-tenant office buildings and retail centers.
